name: CLARITY_POOL
description: The CLARITY_POOL table contains summary information about the risk pools into which incoming capitation moneys are distributed, and from which capitation and/or AP claims payments are drawn.

columns.name: POOL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID number of the risk pool record.

columns.name: POOL_ID_POOL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the risk pool.

columns.name: POOL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the risk pool.
